lyrics:
"On Us" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "On Us" (feat. Migos) [Hook:] There's a party at my mansion, we got drinks on us There's a party, we got game on us Got game, got mollie, got lean, got pills, got racks on racks on us There's a party in my mansion, tryna sit with us I like the way she dancing, you need to come with us It tears everything, bricks, clothes, we got everything on us There's a party at my mansion, drinks on us [Verse 1:] There's a party at my mansion, pull up in a panoramic Pouring up from magazines, boutie, I'm a draw her an Advil Lookin' hood with all them chains on Don't fuck with a mike, get rained on Meet the plug at home-come I'm backin' for life, pay pawn Run run with a motha' like Reese Holmes Aw, yeah, nigga, some pee on Oh, me got me on a ringtone I call the plug and get three's on I smoke 'em up cause I'm paranoid My glasses on, they tong for it My blunt long, get snitch a cold Got game here, er'body know it [Hook:] Got game, got mollie, got lean, got pills, got racks on racks on us There's a party at my mansion, drinks on us I like the way she dancing, you need to come with us 18-17 brick squad, with that everything on us On us There's a party at my mansion, drinks on us On us On us [Verse 2: Migos] I'm a real trap nigga, surrounded by pistols and killers Sellin' that dirt that'll kill ya Da hell you lookin'? I might be here killa You strip by yo bottles and liquor I'm coffin' that lean by the liter I'm smokin' on reefa, shaleda my people Pull up in that Lotus, I look like a creature I got cash on me, no fever My diamons raw Acafiena Got mollie, got gag got sand I'm with the coke, kill it with the fan All the jury on us Niggas gon' pack the run up Not sayn that I can get touched But run up and watch you get bust [Hook:] Got game, got mollie, got lean, got pills, got racks on racks on us There's a party at my mansion, drinks on us I like the way she dancing, you need to come with us 18-17 brick squad, with that everything on us On us There's a party at my mansion, drinks on us On us On us if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Brick Factory: Volume One" (2014) Cash Shit Aight On Us Paper Problems My Customer Real Gas Say A Prayer Serve On No Love Pour Some More Texas Margarita Bring It On Homeboys Love Somebody NWA Search
title: On Us Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
